To get to the University, you need to sneak through the Nolfwood. Dispatch this gobloid scout before he warns the nearby village!
A gobloid ambush! That scout must not have been alone.
You\'ve stumbled onto a gobloid village and alerted the guards. Defeat these two and get out of here!
You ran the wrong way. Now the village shaman and personal guards are here.
You\'ve fought your way to the edge of the forest. Just as you\'re about to escape, a skeletonian shows up!
The Battlefield of Haygor is infested with Skeletonians. Defeat these two and move through here quickly.
Old King Hradrick fell here. His personal guards are still protecting him, though.
You\'re halfway to the University. You can make it!
Uh Oh. It looks like you woke up an old evil wizard. You better get out of here!
That wizard won\'t give up, but you can see the King\'s Highway from here. Defeat the wizard again.
These skeletonians won\'t stop chasing you, and it looks like the gobloids have ran around the battlefield.
The stone marker here means the University watchtower can see you. Hopefully they send out some guards soon!
You\'re in the valley below the University now, and an army of gobloids and skeletonians are chasing you. Keep fighting! Keep moving! You can see help on the way.
The First Gate is unmanned, but arithimagicians are starting to fight some of the other enemies. You\'re almost there!
The Dean stands at the top of the gate, commanding the other students. Defeat these last foes and you\'re home free!
